name: Felling (Dink)
description:
Step into the role of a nimble chameleon, set on a mission to survive the treacherous dangers of the lush jungle. 

With your keen wit and impressive camouflage abilities, you'll navigate through a challenging world filled with obstacles and enemies. In this puzzle platformer, you'll have to use your quick thinking and expert timing to overcome the challenges that lie ahead. Whether you're jumping over spikes, slipping past deadly traps, or blending into your surroundings to evade danger, the jungle will test your skills every step of the way. 

The game's unique mechanics make for a fresh and exciting gameplay experience, as you use your chameleon abilities to make your way to safety. Get ready to put your survival instincts to the test in an ever-changing world of challenges and obstacles!
